name: Hotspots 7
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
>

{%- liquid
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign slider_view = section.settings.slider_view
  assign slider_view_mobile = section.settings.slider_view_mobile
  assign slider_gap = section.settings.slider_gap
  assign slider_gap_mobile = section.settings.slider_gap_mobile

  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile
  assign image_radius = section.settings.image_radius
  assign image_border_thickness = section.settings.image_border_thickness
  assign image_border_color = section.settings.image_border_color
  assign image_bg_overlay = section.settings.image_bg_overlay
  assign image_overlay_color = section.settings.image_overlay_color

  assign hotspot_size = section.settings.hotspot_size
  assign hotspot_size_mobile = section.settings.hotspot_size_mobile
  assign hotspot_bg_color = section.settings.hotspot_bg_color
  assign hotspot_border_color = section.settings.hotspot_border_color
  assign hotspot_icon_color = section.settings.hotspot_icon_color

  assign product_width = section.settings.product_width
  assign product_width_mobile = section.settings.product_width_mobile
  assign product_radius = section.settings.product_radius
  assign product_bg_color = section.settings.product_bg_color

  assign product_image_ratio = section.settings.product_image_ratio
  assign product_image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.product_image_ratio_mobile

  assign product_content_padding_horizontal = section.settings.product_content_padding_horizontal
  assign product_content_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.product_content_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign product_content_padding_vertical = section.settings.product_content_padding_vertical
  assign product_content_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.product_content_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign product_content_align = section.settings.product_content_align
  assign product_content_align_mobile = section.settings.product_content_align_mobile

  assign product_content_horizontal_align = ''
  if product_content_align == 'center'
    assign product_content_horizontal_align = 'center'
  elsif product_content_align == 'right'
    assign product_content_horizontal_align = 'end'
  else
    assign product_content_horizontal_align = 'start'
  endif

  assign product_content_horizontal_align_mobile = ''
  if product_content_align_mobile == 'center'
    assign product_content_horizontal_align_mobile = 'center'
  elsif product_content_align_mobile == 'right'
    assign product_content_horizontal_align_mobile = 'end'
  else
    assign product_content_horizontal_align_mobile = 'start'
  endif

  assign hover_text_custom = section.settings.hover_text_custom
  assign hover_text_font = section.settings.hover_text_font
  assign hover_text_padding_horizontal = section.settings.hover_text_padding_horizontal
  assign hover_text_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.hover_text_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign hover_text_padding_vertical = section.settings.hover_text_padding_vertical
  assign hover_text_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.hover_text_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign hover_text_bg_color = section.settings.hover_text_bg_color
  assign hover_text_radius = section.settings.hover_text_radius
  assign hover_text_size = section.settings.hover_text_size
  assign hover_text_size_mobile = section.settings.hover_text_size_mobile
  assign hover_text_height = section.settings.hover_text_height
  assign hover_text_color = section.settings.hover_text_color

  assign close_bg_color = section.settings.close_bg_color
  assign close_color = section.settings.close_color

  assign use_vendor = section.settings.use_vendor
  assign vendor_custom = section.settings.vendor_custom
  assign vendor_font = section.settings.vendor_font
  assign vendor_size = section.settings.vendor_size
  assign vendor_size_mobile = section.settings.vendor_size_mobile
  assign vendor_height = section.settings.vendor_height
  assign vendor_color = section.settings.vendor_color

  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color
  assign title_mt = section.settings.title_mt
  assign title_mt_mobile = section.settings.title_mt_mobile

  assign use_desc = section.settings.use_desc
  assign desc_custom = section.settings.desc_custom
  assign desc_font = section.settings.desc_font
  assign desc_size = section.settings.desc_size
  assign desc_size_mobile = section.settings.desc_size_mobile
  assign desc_height = section.settings.desc_height
  assign desc_color = section.settings.desc_color
  assign desc_mt = section.settings.desc_mt
  assign desc_mt_mobile = section.settings.desc_mt_mobile
  assign desc_length = section.settings.desc_length

  assign price_custom = section.settings.price_custom
  assign price_font = section.settings.price_font
  assign price_size = section.settings.price_size
  assign price_size_mobile = section.settings.price_size_mobile
  assign price_height = section.settings.price_height
  assign price_original_color = section.settings.price_original_color
  assign price_color = section.settings.price_color
  assign price_compare = section.settings.price_compare
  assign price_mt = section.settings.price_mt
  assign price_mt_mobile = section.settings.price_mt_mobile

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile
  assign arrow_hover_effect = section.settings.arrow_hover_effect


  assign lazy_load_setting = 'lazy'
  if lazy == false
    assign lazy_load_setting = 'eager' 
  endif
  
  # Determine image aspect ratio based on settings
  assign image_aspect_ratio = 800
  if image_ratio == 'portrait'
    assign image_aspect_ratio = 1200
  elsif image_ratio == 'square'
    assign image_aspect_ratio = 800
  elsif image_ratio == 'landscape'
    assign image_aspect_ratio = 533
  endif
  
  # Get product width values as numbers for image_tag sizing
  assign product_width_value = product_width | times: 1
  assign product_width_mobile_value = product_width_mobile | times: 1
  
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{  hover_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  vendor_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  desc_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  price_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    position: relative;
  }

  .hotspots-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    overflow: visible !important;
  }

  .hotspots-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    opacity: 0.7;
    z-index: 1;
  }

  .hotspots-slide-{{ section.id }}::after {
    position: absolute;
    content: "";
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background-color: {{ image_overlay_color |  hex_to_rgba: image_bg_overlay }};
    pointer-events: none;
    border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px;
  }

  .hotspots-slide-{{ section.id }}.swiper-slide-active {
    opacity: 1;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    z-index: 2;
  }

  .hotspots-image-{{ section.id }} {
    border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px;
    border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ image_border_color }};
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .hotspots-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .hotspots-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .hotspots-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .hotspots-hover-text-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
    min-width: max-content;
    max-width: 250px;
    padding: {{ hover_text_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ hover_text_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    background-color: {{ hover_text_bg_color }};
    border-radius: {{ hover_text_radius }}px;
    opacity: 0;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 160%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    pointer-events: none;
  }

  .hotspots-hover-text-{{ section.id }}::after {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    border: 6px solid transparent;
    border-top: 6px solid {{ hover_text_bg_color }};
    bottom: -11px;
    left: calc(50% - 6px);
  }

  .hotspots-hover-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    word-wrap: break-word;
    margin: 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-size: {{ hover_text_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ hover_text_color }};
    line-height: {{ hover_text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .hotspots-item-{{ section.id }}.active .hotspots-hover-text-{{ section.id }} {
    opacity: 1;
    pointer-events: all;
  }

  .hotspots-item-{{ section.id }}.active-mobile .hotspots-hover-text-{{ section.id }} {
    opacity: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
  }

  .hotspots-item-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1
  }

  .hotspots-item-icon-{{ section.id }} {
    width: {{ hotspot_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ hotspot_size_mobile }}px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  .hotspots-item-icon-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .hotspots-item-icon-{{ section.id }} svg circle {
    fill: {{ hotspot_bg_color }};
    stroke: {{ hotspot_border_color }};
  }

  .hotspots-item-icon-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ hotspot_icon_color }};
  }

  .hotspots-product-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    text-decoration: none;
    width: {{ product_width_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ product_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
    pointer-events: none;
    background-color: {{ product_bg_color }};
    position: absolute;
    top: -50%;
    left: -50%;
    opacity: 0;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }


  .hotspots-product-image-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    overflow: hidden;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    position: relative;
  }

  .hotspots-product-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .hotspots-product-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    overflow: hidden
  }

  .hotspots-product-close-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    right: 0;
    z-index: 1;
    background: {{ close_bg_color }};
    width: 25px;
    height: 25px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  .hotspots-product-close-{{ section.id }} svg line {
    stroke: {{ close_color }};
  }

  .hotspots-product-content-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: {{ product_content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
    padding: {{ product_content_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ product_content_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
  }

  .hotspots-product-vendor-{{ section.id }} {
    word-wrap: break-word;
    margin: 0;
    text-align: {{ product_content_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ vendor_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ vendor_color }};
    line-height: {{ vendor_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .hotspots-product-title-{{ section.id }} {
    word-wrap: break-word;
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: {{ title_mt_mobile }}px;
    font-weight: 700;
    text-align: {{ product_content_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ title_color }};
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .hotspots-product-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: {{ desc_mt_mobile }}px;
    text-align: {{ product_content_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ desc_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ desc_color }};
    line-height: {{ desc_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-wrap: break-word;
  }

  .hotspots-product-price-body-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: {{ product_content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
    margin-top: {{ price_mt_mobile }}px;
    gap: 5px;
  }

  .hotspots-product-price-body-{{ section.id }} strong {
    color: {{ price_color }};
  }

  .hotspots-product-price-{{ section.id }} {
    word-wrap: break-word;
    margin: 0;
    text-align: {{ product_content_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ price_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ price_color }};
    line-height: {{ price_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .hotspots-product-compare-price-{{ section.id }}  {
    word-wrap: break-word;
    margin: 0;
    text-decoration: line-through;
    text-align: {{ product_content_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ price_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ price_original_color }};
    line-height: {{ price_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .hotspots-btn-prev-wrap-{{ section.id }},
  .hotspots-btn-next-wrap-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    z-index: 1;
  }

  .hotspots-btn-prev-wrap-{{ section.id }} {
    left: 15%;
  }

  .hotspots-btn-next-wrap-{{ section.id }} {
    right: 15%;
  }

  .hotspots-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .hotspots-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: 0px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    /* box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15); */
  }

  .hotspots-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
  .hotspots-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
    pointer-events: none;
    place-items: center;
    display: grid;
  }

  .hotspots-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
  .hotspots-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-style: solid;
    border: 0px;
    border-right: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-top: 2px solid currentColor;
    position: relative;
    left: -1px;
  }

  .hotspots-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    left: unset;
    right: -1px;
    border-right: 0px;
    border-top: 0px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-left: 2px solid currentColor;
  }

  .hotspots-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
  .hotspots-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    height: 1.6px;
    transform-origin: center;
    opacity: 0;
    background: currentColor;
    transform: scaleX(.5);
  }

  .hotspots-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span,
  .hotspots-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span {
    color: {{ arrow_color }};
  }

  .hotspots-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .hotspots-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.5;
  }

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }

    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
    }

    .hotspots-hover-text-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ hover_text_padding_vertical }}px {{ hover_text_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .hotspots-hover-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ hover_text_size }}px;
    }

    .hotspots-product-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ product_width }}px;
    }

    .hotspots-product-content-{{ section.id }} {
      justify-content: {{ product_content_horizontal_align }};
      padding: {{ product_content_padding_vertical }}px {{ product_content_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .hotspots-product-vendor-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ vendor_size }}px;
    }

    .hotspots-product-title-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ title_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ product_content_align }};
      font-size: {{ title_size }}px;
    }

    .hotspots-item-icon-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ hotspot_size }}px;
      height: {{ hotspot_size }}px;
    }

    .hotspots-product-text-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ desc_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ product_content_align }};
      font-size: {{ desc_size }}px;
    }

    .hotspots-product-price-body-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ price_mt }}px;
      justify-content: {{ product_content_horizontal_align }};
    }

    .hotspots-product-price-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ product_content_align }};
      font-size: {{ price_size }}px;
    }

    .hotspots-product-compare-price-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ product_content_align }};
      font-size: {{ price_size }}px;
    }

    .hotspots-btn-prev-wrap-{{ section.id }} {
      left: 25%;
    }

    .hotspots-btn-next-wrap-{{ section.id }} {
      right: 25%;
    }

    .hotspots-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .hotspots-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }

    .hotspots-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
    .hotspots-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .hotspots-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
    .hotspots-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    }

    .hotspots-item-wrapper-{{ section.id }}:hover .hotspots-hover-text-{{ section.id }} {
      opacity: 1;
      pointer-events: all;
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }

    .hotspots-item-{{ section.id }}.active .hotspots-hover-text-{{ section.id }} {
      opacity: 0;
      pointer-events: none;
    }

  }

  @media (max-width: 1023px) {
    .hotspots-item-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: 10px;
      margin: -10px;
    }

    .hotspots-item-icon-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ hotspot_size_mobile | plus: 10 }}px;
      height: {{ hotspot_size_mobile | plus: 10 }}px;
    }

    .hotspots-item-{{ section.id }} {
      z-index: 2;
    }

    .hotspots-item-{{ section.id }}.active-mobile {
      z-index: 5;
    }

    .hotspots-product-{{ section.id }} {
      z-index: 3;
    }
  }

   @media (max-width: 1023px) {
    .hotspots-product-{{ section.id }} {
      position: fixed;
      top: 50%;
      left: 50%;
      transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(0);
      z-index: 1000;
      max-height: 90vh;
      overflow-y: auto;
    }

    .hotspots-item-{{ section.id }}.active-mobile .hotspots-product-{{ section.id }} {
      transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(1);
    }

    body.modal-open {
      overflow: hidden;
    }
  }
{%- endstyle -%}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if hover_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .hotspots-hover-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ hover_text_font.family }}, {{ hover_text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ hover_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ hover_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if vendor_custom %}
  <style>
    .hotspots-product-vendor-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ vendor_font.family }}, {{ vendor_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ vendor_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ vendor_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if title_custom %}
  <style>
    .hotspots-product-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ title_font.family }}, {{ title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if desc_custom %}
  <style>
    .hotspots-product-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ desc_font.family }}, {{ desc_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ desc_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ desc_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

<script>
  function loadSwiper(callback) {
    if (window.Swiper) {
      callback();
    } else {
      const script = document.createElement('script');
      script.src = "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@6.8.4/swiper-bundle.min.js";
      script.onload = callback;
      document.head.appendChild(script);
    }
  }

  function initHotspot7(sectionId) {
    const sectionElement = document.getElementById(`shopify-section-${sectionId}`);
    const sliderElement = sectionElement.querySelector(`.hotspots-slider-${sectionId}`);
    
    if (!sliderElement) return;
  
    sliderElement.classList.remove('preview');
  
    const hotspots = sectionElement.querySelectorAll(`.hotspots-item-${sectionId}`);
    
    const slider = new Swiper(sliderElement, {
      speed: 800,
      loop: true,
      centeredSlides: true,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: `.hotspots-btn-next-${sectionId}`,
        prevEl: `.hotspots-btn-prev-${sectionId}`,
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap_mobile }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view_mobile }},
        },
        768: {
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap_mobile }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }},
        },
        1024: {
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view }},
        }
      },
      on: {
        slideChange: function () {
          hotspots.forEach((hotspot) => {
            hotspot.classList.remove('active', 'active-mobile');
          });
        }
      }
    });
  
    // Function to close all hotspots
    const closeAllHotspots = () => {
      hotspots.forEach((h) => {
        h.classList.remove('active', 'active-mobile');
      });
      document.body.classList.remove('modal-open');
    };
  
    // Handle clicks on the hotspot icons or close buttons
    sectionElement.addEventListener('click', (event) => {
      const hotspot = event.target.closest(`.hotspots-item-${sectionId}`);
      
      if (hotspot) {
        const icon = event.target.closest(`.hotspots-item-icon-${sectionId}`);
        const close = event.target.closest(`.hotspots-product-close-${sectionId}`);
        
        if (icon) {
          event.preventDefault();
          event.stopPropagation(); // Prevent the document click handler from firing
          
          const isMobile = window.innerWidth < 1024;
          const activeClass = isMobile ? 'active-mobile' : 'active';
          
          // Close all other hotspots
          hotspots.forEach((h) => {
            if (h !== hotspot) {
              h.classList.remove('active', 'active-mobile');
            }
          });
          
          // Toggle the current hotspot
          const isActive = hotspot.classList.toggle(activeClass);
          
          if (isMobile) {
            document.body.classList.toggle('modal-open', isActive);
          }
        } else if (close) {
          event.preventDefault();
          hotspot.classList.remove('active', 'active-mobile');
          document.body.classList.remove('modal-open');
        }
      }
    });
  
    // Add a click event listener to the document to close hotspots when clicking outside
    document.addEventListener('click', (event) => {
      // Check if the click was inside a hotspot or its product
      const clickInsideHotspot = event.target.closest(`.hotspots-item-${sectionId}`);
      const clickInsideProduct = event.target.closest(`.hotspots-product-${sectionId}`);
      
      // If the click was outside both hotspot and product areas, close all hotspots
      if (!clickInsideHotspot && !clickInsideProduct) {
        closeAllHotspots();
      }
    });
  }
  
  function initializeAllHotspotSections() {
    const sections = document.querySelectorAll('[id^="shopify-section-"]');
    sections.forEach(section => {
      if (section.querySelector('.hotspots-slider-{{ section.id }}')) {
        const sectionId = section.id.replace('shopify-section-', '');
        loadSwiper(() => initHotspot7(sectionId));
      }
    });
  }
  
  if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initializeAllHotspotSections);
  } else {
    initializeAllHotspotSections();
  }
  
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', (event) => {
      const sectionId = event.detail.sectionId;
      if (event.target.querySelector('.hotspots-slider-{{ section.id }}')) {
        loadSwiper(() => initHotspot7(sectionId));
      }
    });
  }
</script>
